name: tm23
effect: Teaches Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack with a steel-hard tail. It may lower the foe’s DEFENSE stat.
